316500.name: My Lands: Golden Age - Premium DLC Pack
316500.description:
The Premium activates extended services package for the most effective account management. Duration time - 1 year (366 days).

This package includes:
  • Automatic Exploration
  • Easy view of explored squares from the Kingdom Map
  • Population don't abandon buildings due to long absence of the ruler
  • Population don't riot due to long absence of the ruler
  • The character doesn’t get deleted due to long absence of the ruler
  • Queue of sciences.
  • Queue of construction and upgrade.
  • More mail smileys
  • Up to 100 messages in the Archive
  • Up to 100 players in the Contact List
316500.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 瑞典语, 保加利亚语, 土耳其语, 韩语, 丹麦语
